[Page Title: Dragonfly Cocktails & Spirits | Bartending services]

top of page Your Bar is not just a bar to us, it's a chance to tell a story, coupled with experience and knowledgeable bartenders, and bar planners who think of everything,  we believe it does matter who is behind your bar.!  Book us today! Welcome ABOUT Our Story , is a woman owned company.  Owner Carrie Eddings-Foster saw a need to create bars that were classy, memorable and backed with experience,  so s Dragonfly Cocktails & Spirits he took her 10+ years experience in the Bartending industry and the Event Planning Industry to create Dragonfly Cocktails and Spirits. At Dragonfly our mission and belief is "The Bar" is the experience!  It's a place to tell a story, a place everyone gathers, a place were everyone deserves extraordinary cocktails and service. This means expertly crafted cocktails, professional & experienced staff, stunning décor, impeccable customer service, promptness and a seamless sales process to make your your planning and event unforgettable, and seem effortless. ​W hether it’s a corporate event, private party, or a wedding, our team is dedicated to making sure each guest has a great experience and that your bar stands out above the rest!! (Tips Certified, Licensed and Insured) ​ It does matter whose behind your bar! Our Services Flyer Know your bars options Cocktail Making Parties Party Favors & Flavors Bar Preliminary Pricing Cheat Sheet Getting Married? Here is a Bar Check List Shopping for 100 -(If you the Client is providing the product) Legal Terms & Contract Tips Certified, Licensed & Insured Thank yall so much. Yall were fantastic. Thanks, Lauren O' 
Dragonfly is a name that holds a special meaning. It is a tribute to a hardworking and kind-hearted woman who always had a soft spot for those in need. Dragonflies are believed to be spiritual creatures that bring good luck, and seeing one is a sign that someone is looking after you. With this name, we honor the legacy of a woman who touched the lives of many and left a lasting impact on our hearts.
Our Services My staff in the evening said y’all were amazing! ~ Hart Meadows Ranch, Andrea bottom of page

[Page Title: TIPS CERTIFIED & INSURED | Dragonfly Cocktails]

top of page We are TIPS CERTIFIED
& INSURED What does being TIPS Certified and Insured mean? 
Why is it important when selecting Bar Services or Bartending Service? is a State Certification process for people serving alcohol.  Being Tips Certified is essential for any bar services business, bartenders and it's employees.  TIPS training also enhances customer service by equipping employees with the skills to identify and prevent problematic behaviors related to alcohol consumption. Lastly, it ensures compliance with state requirements, as many jurisdictions mandate alcohol server training. Always check local regulations to determine if TIPS certification is necessary for your establishment/ venue. TIPS certification ​ Being Insured 
aggregate. ​
Insurance is crucial for mobile bartenders in South Carolina as it safeguards against potential financial losses associated with serving alcohol. Liquor liability insurance is essential, covering legal expenses and damages if a customer is injured or causes harm while intoxicated. This protection includes coverage for property damage, personal injury, or event. In South Carolina, it's important to note that the minimum coverage required is $1 million per occurrence and $2 million in Many venues require this insurance for your event.  If your venue requires it.  Please contact your bar planner, she will get the necessary COI (Certificate of Insurance) to your venue 30 days prior to event date, with its specific requirements. ​ You can rest easy knowing we have your bar covered! ​ Need a COI from us for your event?  Please message us the details Get in touch so we can start working together. First Name Last Name Email Message Send Thanks for submitting! bottom of page

[Page Title: BOOK A COCKTAIL MAKING PARTY | Dragonfly Cocktails]

top of page Lets Book a Cocktail Making Party!! All Cocktail Parties are approximately 2 hours long, We supply all the Tips Certified Bartender/instructor, all the materials needed to make 4 different cocktails & parting recipes & gifts There is an Initial Set-up/Booking fee of $600 & then a per person fee per the count of people at your party.  Fees per person depends on the number in a party. Parties need to be at least 10 people or more Group Discounts are available on quantities above 10 people Please fill out Cocktail Class Form or call 843-290-2698 First name * Last name * Email * Phone * Multi-line address Country/Region * Address * City * Zip / Postal code * Day you are wanting to book? * Are you an individual booking for a group or are you a Company booking a team building? Please indicated your role and what type of event it is you are booking *

[Page Title: BARS & BARRELS | Dragonfly Cocktails]

top of page BARS & BARRELS AVAILIABLE TO RENT At Dragonfly Cocktails, we are a Bartending Service Business dedicated to offering exceptional Bartending Services tailored to your unique event needs. While our primary focus is on delivering outstanding service, we are growing our business every day to offer more options and flexibility. For now, we are pleased to provide our exclusive Bars & Barrels available to rent with any of our Bartending Services, or alone. Elevate your next event with our professional expertise in Event Bar Planning & Bartending Services and let us bring memorable cocktails and experiences to you! 
Linen Bar
Comes in Black Linen (recommended)  or  White Linen as well (there is an up charge for the dry-cleaning for White Linen) ​ Can come in sizes: 6ft 8ft 12 ft 16ft ​ ​ Can come stand alone "I" shape or "L" Shaped or "U" Shaped 
Wheel Barrel Bar or Table
Rustic "Jack Daniels" Wheel Barrels can add a unique rustic look to your bar. ​ Used as: Bar Ends to the Linen Bars Stand alone Table (like shown in picture) 6ft recommended As Cocktail Tables with no top or Glass Top on them ​ Get a Free Quote First name * Last name * Email * Phone * Multi-line address Country/Region * Address * City * Zip / Postal code *

*

Wheel Barrel

Other
Any questions or details you would like to share?: * Submit bottom of page
